channel.title: Problem starting Deltascape's source
channel.description:
I just got Deltascape's Source, wanted to give it a shot. When i use the run.bat, it starts up, but then starts saying "null" "null" "null" "null" "null" "null"
Over and over... So i can't log in. Any ideas why its saying that, and doesn't let me on?
Thanks.
Here's my run.bat code if thats any use:
[code] @echo off color 0a title Deltascape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server [/code]
Im using "The perfect Compiler"
[code]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: :: :: This Compiler is under no licenses and may :: :: be distributed freely. :: :: :: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit [/code]

item.title: Problem starting Deltascape's source
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

I just got Deltascape’s Source, wanted to give it a shot. When i use the run.bat, it starts up, but then starts saying
“null”
“null”
“null”
“null”
“null”
“null”

Over and over… So i can’t log in.
Any ideas why its saying that, and doesn’t let me on?

Thanks.

Here’s my run.bat code if thats any use:

@echo off
color 0a
title Deltascape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Im using “The perfect Compiler”

:: ::
:: This Compiler is under no licenses and may ::
:: be distributed freely. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
[/code]

Read full topic
